name: Space Fighters
description: You there, combat pilot! Control your spaceship and battle others to win a fast-paced, fun game of king of the hill, free for all or team deathmatch. All in the total freedom and maneuverability of 3D outer space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q6600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 TI DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 140 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
